raw_comment:
1-What I notice?
I notice that this graph compares the student chances to get accepted into a prestigious college based on a variety of requirements like test score, economic and family status.  I also notice the legacy students had more chance to get admitted to one of those colleges than a student who not is part of a legacy.
2-What I wonder?
why this graph has a certain decreases?
3-The message:
-NO legacy , NO college
4- Catchy Title:
-Advantage to be RICH.
ace_sentences: This graph compares the chances of students to get accepted into a prestigious college.
The comparison is based on several requirements.
A test score is a requirement.
An economic status is a requirement.
A family status is a requirement.
Legacy students have a higher chance to get admitted to such a college than non-legacy students.
I wonder why this graph shows a decrease at some point.
The message is: No legacy means no college.
The title is: Advantage to be rich.
